name: Shoot'em Together
description:
Shoot'em Together is a shooting game demo created for GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

- Include 4 levels !

- Press space, or Left Mouse Click to fire

- A/D or Left/Right move the turret

- Shoot pick ups to get more turrets on your track

- Enemy touch turret will kill it, all turrets dead level will restart ! 

BGM Music:

Street Party Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
